name: DailyVocabulary(Learnanewworddaily)
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: daily vocabulary
des:
Isn't it great to know all the words, isn't it like unlocking a new level in your vocabulary game, you are just one step away to achieve that. This skill brings you a new word daily with it's meaning which help you remember it.

So just enable the skill and learn a new word daily.

Happy learning.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
